job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description:
Position: ETL Data Engineer with PostgreSQL Experience
Duration: Long Term
Location: NYC, NY | Lake Mary, FL (Remote work till COVID)
No. of positions: 1
12 -15 years’ experience working with data (data engineering, Design lead , Building Framework and Solutions etc.)
Experience analyzing and working with large datasets and designing solution a must
Strong experience in building/designing reusable solution and framework
Proficiency with SQL – 10+ years’ experience
Strong experience in PostgreSQL, Redshift DB
Strong experience in working Cloud framework
Strong experience of ETL tools like Informatica PowerCenter -10+ years’ experience
Strong experience in IICS . Minimum 2+ years’ experience
Strong experience in AWS different components . Must be proficient  in Athena, Redshift, S3,Lamda,Glue etc.
Experience using GitHub
Must be able to both read & understand code as well as feel comfortable using code as a tool for data analysis
Experience using tools like Alteryx
Demonstrated Critical thinking ability including the ability to define a problem, frame it for a broad audience and collaborate with others to formulate solutions
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team with proven ability to influence with impact across functions and disciplines.
Must be detail oriented
Must be familiar working in agile environment
